data.title: Arthur Howard Penn Net Worth (2024)
data.meta_description: Arthur Howard Penn is the Founder, Chairman & CEO at PennantPark Investment.
data.text:
How old is Mr Penn?

Mr Penn is 58, he's been the Founder and Chairman & CEO of PennantPark Investment since . There are 1 older and 4 younger executives at PennantPark Investment. The oldest executive at PennantPark Investment Corporation is Guy Francis Talarico J.D., 66, who is the Chief Compliance Officer.

Insiders trading at PennantPark Investment

Over the last 17 years, insiders at PennantPark Investment have traded over $35,828 worth of PennantPark Investment stock and bought 1,756,281 units worth $12,147,388 . The most active insiders traders include Arthur H Penn, Jeffrey Flug, and Samuel L Katz. On average, PennantPark Investment executives and independent directors trade stock every 42 days with the average trade being worth of $89,492. The most recent stock trade was executed by Richard T Jr Allorto on 12 March 2024, trading 5,000 units of PNNT stock currently worth $34,000.

What does PennantPark Investment do?

pennantpark investment advisers is a leader in providing middle-market companies with creative and flexible capital solutions across the capital structure. its staff of 35 is headquartered in new york city, with offices in chicago, los angeles, houston, and london. founded in 2007, pennantpark today manages approximately $2.1 billion across publicly-listed business development companies (pennantpark investment corporation - "pnnt"; pennantpark floating rate capital ltd. - “pflt”), and private vehicles for institutional limited partners, including the pennantpark credit opportunities fund ii, lp - "pcof ii" and multiple managed accounts and co-investment vehicles. led by founder arthur penn, pennantpark's senior team has deep individual experience and a long history of working together. from inception to december 31, 2016, they have invested over $5.7 billion into 482 transactions across a range of industries including business services, consumer products, distribution, manufacturing/ba
